events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will start reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on the skills and experiences listed.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will contact you soon.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your experience with development frameworks and software projects.
You responded promptly with detailed answers about your past development work and your interest in our engineering team.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 8th, involving coding exercises and a system design discussion.
You successfully completed the technical interview, impressing the panel with your problem-solving skills and coding expertise.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 12th to discuss your alignment with company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview, sharing your career goals and enthusiasm for joining our software development team.
We have proposed an employment offer including competitive salary and benefits tailored to your experience as a software engineer.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about the possibility of joining our engineering team.
You have formally accepted our job offer and are now set to start your journey with the software development department.
The onboarding process has begun, including setup of development environments and introduction to the engineering team.
Your hiring process is now officially closed. We welcome you aboard as a new software engineer on our team.
